title: dkcutter.json schema
description: The schema for the dkcutter.json file.

^[a-zA-Z0-9_]+$.description: The value of the input. This can be a string, a boolean, an array of strings, or an object.

promptMessage.description: The message to display to the user when prompting for input.

value.description: The value of the input. This can be a string, an array of strings, or a boolean.

choices.description: The choices to display to the user when prompting for input. This is only used for select and multiselect inputs.

title.description: The title of the choice. This is the text that will be displayed to the user.

description.description: The description of the choice. This is the text that will be displayed to the user when hovering over the choice.

value.description: The value of the choice. This is the value that will be returned when the choice is selected.

helpTextForDisabled.description: The help text to display to the user when the choice is disabled.

selected.description: Whether the choice is selected. This is only used for multiselect inputs.

choicesType.description: The type of choices to display to the user when prompting for input. This is only used for select and multiselect inputs.

validateRegex.description: The regex to validate the input against. This is only used for text inputs.

regex.description: The regex to validate the input against.

message.description: The message to display to the user when the input does not match the regex.
